dict.acceptation: 结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合；合并；

sent.orig: Same-sex marriage, polygamous marriage and opposite-sex monogamous marriage are three different family structures.
sent.trans: 同性婚姻、多配偶制婚姻以及异性之间的一夫一妻制婚姻是三种不同的家庭结构。

sent.orig: How to provide void marriage and voidable marriage in marriage law?
sent.trans: 如何在婚姻法中设置无效婚姻和得撤销的婚姻？

sent.orig: Only love makes marriage holy and pure and only purified marriage isreal marriage.
sent.trans: 只有爱情才使婚姻神圣纯洁，只有纯净的婚姻才是真正的婚姻。

sent.orig: Having sex before marriage can push you into a poor marriage.
sent.trans: 婚前发生性行为可能会导致糟糕的婚姻。

sent.orig: Marriage can not save a cracked love, but cracked love only bring cracked marriage.
sent.trans: 婚姻从来不能用来挽救一段破碎的爱情，破碎的爱情只能得到破碎的婚姻。
